featuresSection.heading: Premium 3 BHK Flat Configurations and Key Community Advantages in Palam Vihar Extension Gurugram
description: The residential landscape in Palam Vihar Extension is diverse catering to various budget requirements while maintaining a standard of quality construction. Our portfolio includes newly built and meticulously maintained 3BHK flats that ensure complete satisfaction and comfort for the discerning buyer. These properties are located within safe and established neighborhoods providing peace of mind to homeowners.

We focus on providing detailed information about the construction quality legal status and potential for customization within each 3BHK apartment. Whether you prioritize a ground-floor unit for convenience or a top-floor apartment for expansive views Palam Vihar Extension has the perfect solution. Review these core features that make our 3BHK offerings stand out in the Gurugram market.

features.title: Ready-to-Move Builder Floors
features.description: Many properties available are independent builder floors offering greater privacy and flexibility compared to high-rise complexes. These units often come with dedicated parking and terrace rights and are immediately available for possession allowing you to shift without construction delays. Securing a ready-to-move 3BHK flat ensures you avoid the uncertainties associated with under-construction projects.

features.title: Spacious 3BHK Layouts
features.description: The typical 3BHK flat for sale in Palam Vihar Extension features generous room sizes separate living and dining areas and three washrooms ensuring comfort for larger families. Layouts are designed for maximum efficiency maximizing carpet area and minimizing wasted space providing a truly luxurious feeling within your new home in Gurugram.

features.title: Excellent Connectivity
features.description: Palam Vihar Extension enjoys superior road infrastructure connecting it seamlessly to Delhi Dwarka Expressway and NH48. Commuting to major business hubs like Cyber City and Udyog Vihar is quick and straightforward saving valuable travel time. This strategic location boosts both residential appeal and future property appreciation.

features.title: Secure Gated Communities
features.description: Safety is a top priority for families considering a 3BHK flat purchase. Many available properties are situated within gated colonies offering 24/7 security surveillance controlled access points and dedicated maintenance staff. This ensures a tranquil and secure environment for children and seniors alike within Palam Vihar Extension.

features.title: Modern Interior Design
features.description: The new flats feature contemporary finishes high-quality fittings modular kitchens and designer wardrobes. These aesthetically pleasing interiors reduce the necessity for immediate renovations allowing you to move in and start enjoying your home immediately. We offer units equipped with superior specifications tailored to modern living standards.

features.title: High Rental Yield Potential
features.description: Due to its proximity to Delhi and major Gurugram corporate offices Palam Vihar Extension is highly desirable for tenants. Investing in a 3BHK flat here provides a strong opportunity for stable rental income making it an attractive choice for investors looking for long-term appreciation and immediate returns on their capital.

Review this list of key amenities and landmarks that underscore the prime positioning of owning a 3BHK flat for sale in Palam Vihar Extension.

faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions About 3BHK Flats in Palam Vihar Extension Gurugram
faqSection.description: We address common questions to provide clarity and confidence as you consider buying a 3BHK property in this sought-after locality.

faqs.question: What is the typical price range for a 3BHK flat for sale in Palam Vihar Extension
faqs.answer: The pricing for a 3BHK flat in Palam Vihar Extension is highly dependent on factors such as size amenities and whether it is a builder floor or part of a multi-storey project. Generally prices start from approximately INR 70 Lacs and can go upwards of INR 1.5 Crore for premium luxury units in prime locations. We advise requesting a personalized consultation to receive the most accurate current market rates based on your specific requirements.

faqs.question: Are the 3BHK properties here primarily newly constructed or resale
faqs.answer: Palam Vihar Extension is a developed locality meaning there is a healthy mix of both new construction and resale 3BHK flats. Many new builder floors are constantly being developed offering modern specifications while resale properties often provide the benefit of immediate possession and established community living. Our listings clearly indicate the age and construction status of each 3BHK flat.

faqs.question: Is Palam Vihar Extension considered a safe and family-friendly location
faqs.answer: Absolutely Palam Vihar Extension is well-regarded for its security infrastructure and community feel making it extremely family-friendly. Most residential blocks and societies are gated with 24/7 security and active Resident Welfare Associations RWA ensuring a vigilant and secure environment for all residents especially families with young children and elderly members.

faqs.question: What documentation is required to purchase a 3BHK flat in this area
faqs.answer: To complete the purchase of a 3BHK flat you will typically need documents including the Sale Deed Title Deed Encumbrance Certificate No Objection Certificates NOCs and the original sanction plan. If financing is involved bank statements and identity proofs are also necessary. Our legal team is available to assist you in verifying and organizing all necessary paperwork.

faqs.question: Are 3BHK builder floors in Palam Vihar Extension RERA registered
faqs.answer: While individual builder floors often fall outside the typical RERA regulations for large projects many reputable builders voluntarily comply with RERA standards for transparency. For high-rise residential projects RERA registration is mandatory. We strictly verify the legal standing of every 3BHK property listed ensuring all statutory compliances are met for your peace of mind.

faqs.question: How good is the water and electricity infrastructure in Palam Vihar Extension
faqs.answer: Being an established area Palam Vihar Extension benefits from reliable civic infrastructure managed by the Municipal Corporation of Gurugram MCG. Electricity supply is generally stable with backup provided in most new 3BHK societies and water supply is sufficient with a combination of municipal lines and borewell support in some residential pockets.

faqs.question: Can non-residents buy a 3BHK flat in Palam Vihar Extension Gurugram
faqs.answer: Yes non-resident Indian NRIs and foreign nationals are legally permitted to purchase residential property in India including 3BHK flats in Palam Vihar Extension subject to adherence to FEMA regulations. We provide specialized consultation services to guide NRIs through the entire property acquisition process.

faqs.question: What are the common sizes available for a 3BHK flat in this locality
faqs.answer: The standard size for a 3BHK flat varies but common super areas range from 1350 sq ft to over 2000 sq ft depending on the builder and specific layout. Builder floors generally offer larger carpet areas compared to high-rise apartments. We can provide detailed floor plans and super area specifications upon request.

faqs.question: What are the loan eligibility criteria for purchasing a 3BHK property here
faqs.answer: Loan eligibility criteria typically include a stable income proof of employment a good credit score and the ability to pay a minimum down payment usually 10-20% of the property value. Since Palam Vihar Extension is a well-regarded location banks are generally eager to finance the purchase of a 3BHK flat here.

faqs.question: Is there good public transportation access near the 3BHK residential complexes
faqs.answer: Connectivity is excellent. The area is well-served by local auto-rickshaws taxis and city bus routes. Furthermore Palam Vihar Extension provides convenient access to the nearest metro stations and major road networks ensuring hassle-free commuting for residents of a 3BHK flat.
